title: Alternatives to Plastic Straws: Which Materials Are Best? - SciTechDaily
body: Drinking straws are single use plastic products which will be subjected to a Europe-wide sales ban from 2021 onwards. This is stated in EU Directive 2019/904 from June 5, 2019.
